text: 12.15: 1 T 6.7-10Ana mbaram khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde warir rɨvɨv tuituigira wari kɨri. Nde kha ndɨkndɨgir muuŋ thari, ‘Gu kha nuianan garav niihi bigi, gu zam nta ndigirga, gu nzerara kɨv, guigira ndikndigirga.’ Nde khaŋ suanga, nza bigi vhɨrve guarira ndirga. Nde mba bigi ndigirga, nde nzerara kɨv guigira ndikndigirga fhu.”
